about_the_game:
Welcome to the perilous nuclear contaminated waters, where all living creatures are quietly undergoing mutations. You will transform into an ordinary small fish, struggling to survive in this sea area invaded by nuclear pollution. Through continuous evolution and adaptation to the environment, it grows into a powerful ocean monster and ultimately becomes the sole hegemon of this ocean!


Build your Deep Sea Troll: In this game, players will take on the role of a small, fledgling creature whose goal is to evolve into a giant in the deep sea by absorbing radiation and devouring competitors. Players can customize the evolution path of the sea monster according to their preferences, and each choice will affect the shape and ability of the sea monster. With the deepening of the game, players will witness their own sea monster from insignificant fish, to the ruler of the ocean, this process is not only full of achievement, but also endless fun to explore the unknown.


Dynamically mutating challenges: Enemies in the game are not static, but randomly mutate as the environment changes and the game progresses, creating unpredictable challenges for the player. Each game is a new experience and players will face different enemies and challenges, which requires players to constantly adapt to the environment and flexibly adjust their tactics. This random variation mechanism not only increases the complexity of the game, but also simulates the unpredictability of nature, making every game experience unique to the player.


The pleasure of swallowing everything: In the game, players will experience unprecedented swallowing pleasure, each swallowing is the accumulation of power, each growth is the consolidation of the dominance of the ocean.


Organs, Joints and Features: The game has added more organs and features that players can choose from according to their fighting style and evolutionary needs. In addition, the introduction of the joint system allows the player to equip the joint on the organ position, freely adjust the position and orientation of the organ, providing more possibilities for the battle strategy of the sea monster.

Challenge of Overlord enemies: Each enemy type has a new Overlord character, who acts as the parent body and can spawn new enemies with unique upgrades and skills. Players need to face these powerful overlords, through the battle of strategy and strength, to prove their dominance.

New experience in Exploration Mode: The game introduces a new exploration mode with ten different levels. Players need to complete these levels, collect new mutations, unlock new evolutionary paths, and further enrich their sea monster to become a true Lord of the deep sea.
